channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 10/31/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Added a light theme option. Adjusted meetings to fully transcribe the entire meeting (with partial data masking depending on the user’s SeaMeet plan). Refined in-call messages to include language, inviter information, and plan details. Bugfix # Improved reconnection mechanisms to handle unexpected service interruptions. 10/24/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Introduced an audio retention mechanism to ensure full audio recording in case of brief meeting interruptions.
